value.description: Credit: Denver Police Department DENVER (KDVR) — The Denver District Attorney’s Officer legal review of the officer-involved shooting of 48-year-old Larry Hamm on Dec. 28 of 2020 is complete.

value.name: N.J. activists still fighting for change gather one year after George Floyd killing
value.description: For NJ Advance Media The small group of people who congregated in front of the Essex County Historic Courthouse in Newark on Tuesday to mark one year since George Floyd’s killing in Minneapolis was a far cry from the thousands who gathered there last May.

value.name: Denver Takeout: ‘Hold the paper and plastic’; changes approved for single-use plastic
value.description: Denver City Council has approved an ordinance that will require restaurants to ask if you want single-use utensils and napkins in the future.
